author: Luke Yee <lucyee01@meta.com>
description:
Hi Piotr,

Just following up again! My name is Luke and I support Meta’s Software Engineer hiring team!

We are building platforms for the Metaverse, GenAi, as well as large scale Infrastructure for Facebook, Ads, Search and Security. Please feel free to visit our blog to find out more about our mission and our community (https://www.facebook.com/careers/community/).<https://www.facebook.com/careers/community/).?__xts__%5B0%5D=131.AZz889EX2jIvIxtgiRFSb5tgKtQ_eTG-BE1Ilq9IH3wMFjpOWHsNcBXxPJAZ0g3Pve-v88i4wY_89VvvNLXf9VyrqLxOY0tx0MN__25UL44EGA1VxctUbxoiHPbobEt3T1GtRtYxeX2Lb4VUh7Rs8A>

If you're open to exploring opportunities at Meta, I've included access to my calendar below! What's the best time to reach you today?

I look forward to discussing opportunities at Meta with you!

Thanks,
Luke
<https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.metacareers.com%2Fprofile%2Fcall%2F%3Fconsideration_id%3D1128167429476498%26recruiter_nonce%3DGVL7vaWjHXEygLwrRdjAMwy99axdu3BO&h=AT2RtLa7c
title: Following up on Technical Leadership Opportunities at Meta

author: Para Odpowiedzialna za Sektor Wielkopolski B <wielkopolska.b@end.org.pl>
description:
Witajcie,

wzorem lat ubiegłych, w ramach przygotowania oprawy muzycznej na
Pielgrzymkę Regionu 1 (25.04.2026r.) - zapraszamy na  na warsztaty muzyczne
organizowane *12 kwietnia 2026 r.* *godz. 09-19:30* (Niedziela
Miłosierdzia) przez Ewę i Pawła Nowaków z ekipy B9 w parafii św. Józefa
Rzemieślnika w Robakowie.
Szczegóły w załączniku.

Spotkanie ma charakter otwarty, zapraszamy każdego :)

Link do formularza zapisów: https://forms.gle/jZN5hmyWmKVLqrrf7

Paweł B9 - tel. 513 724 034

*-----*

*Pozdrawiamy,*
*Monika Kasprzyk i Grzegorz Jakubiak*
*Para Odpowiedzialna za Sektor Wielkopolska B*
title: Zaproszenie na warsztaty muzyczne i wielbienie 12.04.2026

author: DEV Community <yo@dev.to>
description:
Congratulations, Piotr! You got the One Year Club badge! Be sure to check out your profile.

This badge celebrates the longevity of those who have been a registered member of the DEV Community for at least one year.

Happy DEV Community birthday! Can you believe it's been 1 year already?!



https://dev.to/rumca-js
title: You just got a badge
